I purchased this litter 5 times, more or less, in the past. the last order placed in Aug. 2025 was not the same as my previous orders. I should have returned it.
it is thicker/rougher. Just not the same texture/quality.
every time I scoop it I can't help but mentally tell myself "this is not the same".

title: received a bad batch! should I order again?

text: Did I miss something in the info? I generally buy 8.5 containers. I assumed I would get two containers of litter with each weighing 8.5 lbs. Nope. Box came w 17 lbs in a single plastic bag. I‚Äôm 80+ female and that packaging doesn‚Äôt work for me!

text: This product leaves a smell and not good for kittens. They track litter and it does have a dust type feel. Not worth it.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 24 de septiembre de 2025
title: Do not get. Clumps and leaves dust and smell.

text: I really wanted to like this stuff. It's the easiest litter to pour + spread + carry around given how light it is. But genuinely it doesn't conceal odors. We keep our cat's litter box in a litter cabinet in our closet, so things usually don't smell at all, but with this litter I can't go 2-3 days without the closet and hallway smelling strongly of ammonia. Compared to Arm & Hammer, this stuff is a joke. Will not be buying again.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 24 de septiembre de 2025
title: Lightweight, But Doesn't Conceal Odors

text: Truly awful at stopping odor. 3 days after putting a fresh batch down my house reeks of cat doody. Also, it‚Äôs packaged like box wine.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 22 de septiembre de 2025
title: Horrendous at stopping smell

text: Good odor control but tracks all over the house no matter how many or what kind of litter mats and rugs I put down. Makes a total mess when wet paws climb on everything. Will have to explore other options.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 22 de septiembre de 2025
title: Tracks all over house

text:
Zero stars. I've used this product (unscented) for years. The last 2 boxes Have Not Worked - it stopped clumping. Now it just makes the litter a darker color and it now smells horrible, making my entire house smell. And it isn't sticking to poo, any more. Why the formula change?
I left a review for the same thing on a scented version which was shipped because this unscented version was out of stock. I'd rather buy the $5.99 cheapest litter than this product-at least that cheap stuff absorbs urine; urine just puddles like wet dirt with this product.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 18 de septiembre de 2025
title: Do Not Buy-No Longer Absorbs or Clumps
